authentication.title: Welcome back
authentication.subtitle: Sign in to access your personalized dashboard and services.
authentication.phoneDescription: * This is your phone number registered with us.
authentication.phoneErrorLength: Phone number must be at least 10 characters long.
authentication.phoneErrorFormat: Please enter a valid phone number.
authentication.passwordError: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
authentication.passwordComplexityError: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
